title: Nuxt + Vercel KV: Coding an AI Agent Network MVP (flow state devLog)
description:
Discover how to build an AI agent network MVP using Nuxt 3, Vercel KV Store, and Cytoscapejs. This Devlog serves as a practical guide, showcasing just a fraction of the potential of these technologies. In this video we build out the UI for an AI agent network monitoring system. 

In the future (or should I say present), we'll be using agentic software to write code, develop ideas, work faster, prototype, create business value and much more. This devlog showcases what a simple MVP of an AI agent network could look like, so that we can more easily visualize, manage and understand our AI agent systems.
